Articles.Content:
Nah, I'm not really into this "watching other people play my games"-thing.

The user below me isn't either.

Nope

TUBM is a pyrotechnic

No im not. But i can blow stuff up in KSP, so that counts.

TUBM is in a relationship.

Happily married, so yes.

The user below me has had their heart broken.

Absolutely. Love is a fickle thing indeed.

TUBM prefers to pour their beer in to a glass rather than drink it from the original container. (Substitute soda if you're not a drinker.)

Can i substite champagne, rather than beer? Glasses all the way.

TUBM prefers wine over beer.

False - I just can't drink wine. Tried it repeatedly....

The user below me doesn't have a drivers license.

5 more years! I can get there

TUBM will watch this cool vid I found:

Why did I even click on the link and why did I even think it was going to be something else

TUBM enjoys watching boring people stream KSP

Nope - I don't enjoy any streams of people playing anything tbh.

The user below me likes heavy metal.

Nah, too weird.

TUBM is near a city with a population over 1 million people

TUBM is near a city with a population over 1 million people.

False. We don't have those here.

TUBM is near a city with a population over 1 million people

Or those.

TUBM lives in the Northern Hemisphere.

Indeed I do.

TUBMhas subscribed to my youtube channel or my twitch channel.

Uh.. no? (advertising? lol)

TUBM is a viking aka from Iceland. Or Faroe Islands.

Nope, purely American

TUBM is OK with letting me get away with advertising on this forum game.

Seems legit. Btw, your line of planes shows up but your twitch thing is cut in half and anything that may be below it is not visible. You might want to fix that.

TUBM is using a monitor with a 3:4 or 4:5 aspect ratio.

Nope, 16:9. (Though I covet a 1440p 21:9 monitor.)

The user below me has more than one monitor connected to their computer.

Sadly no. I have to use an Iphone to read my twitch comments rather than the second monitor which I would desire.

Comrade Wolfe, that's got to be something on your end. My signature appears fine to me, with the twitch badge next to the line of aircraft. Could it be your monitor size?

TUBM has dabbled in ejection seats in KSP.

Yup.

The user below me has a great interest in bananas.

...no. Apples bettur.

TUBM would marry an orange.

Do you mean marry an orange to another orange? Sure!

The user below me has built an awesome rocket in ksp!

It's been a long time since I messed with rockets; my attempts at cool stuff has primarily been aircraft and space shuttles since.

TUBM has played a vehicle building game which isn't KSP.

I have not, to my own surprise.

You are groot, yes?

Yes.

I am Groot.

Everyone is Groot.

Are you, user below me, groot as well?

Who's groot? (Jk, don't hurt me!)

The user below me has gotten a trophy or other award at some point in life
